name: Majoriko Inbizone
overview: Majoriko was just an ordinary teenage school girl, but her friendship with Sawansa, the daughter of a well-known witch, eventually opened a new magical world for her. Here is how it happened: one day, Sawansa's teacher was conducting a magical experiment. While the teacher was absent, Sawansa recklessly jumped into the mirror, and was sucked into a magical parallel dimension controlled by an evil warlock. Naturally, Majoriko has no choice but to follow her... Majoriko Inbizone is a platformer that features the typical jumping and enemy-killing activities, but also usage of magical spells. Majority attacks by firing projectiles with her staff. She can collect coins, which can be used to buy magical items and shop. Many levels require collecting keys or other important items in order to advance. There are also boss battles at the end of most levels. Majoriko loses parts of her clothes when attacked, and becomes completely naked when defeated by an enemy.
